Check_site_template_store_value.description: Check the store value, this determines whether to apply Microsoft out of the box site designs or custom ones.

Check_if_space_type_is_a_Group_and_Site_.description: Check if site template is populated and the space type is a Group. SharePoint space types have the template applied during creation.

Check_if_space_exists.description: Checks if the requested Site/Group/Team already exists by executing the CheckSiteExists logic app.

Check_for_members.description: Check if members were specified when the request was created. Need to pass a different body to the graph call if there are no members. Check if members array length is greater than 1.

Check_teams_template.description: Check if the template is standard (no template). If it is standard, we will use the v1.0 Graph API to teamify the group otherwise we will use the beta API to add a team to the group.

Check_if_space_is_a_team.description: Check if the requested space is a team.

Check_template.description: Check if we should create an Office 365 Group or a Teams Team from a standard template (no template) or a template defined in the admin center.

inputs.name: SiteCreationBody

Add_owner_to_group.description: Use the graph to add the owners to the unified group. This will sync with Viva engage and the owners will become Viva engage community admins.

body.body:
This community was created using the Provision Assist tool.

For helpful tips on getting started with Viva Engage, please visit the help center - https://support.office.com/en-gb/yammer.
body.title: Welcome to the @{triggerBody()?['Title']} Community

Get_Client_ID.description: Get Azure ad app client id from key vault.

Get_Client_Secret.description: Get Azure ad app client id from key vault.

Initialize_Guests_variable.description: Used to build a collection of guests from the Read,Edit and Full Control columns and send the invitation email.

Check_if_space_is_a_Team_-_add_owners_as.description: Due to a bug when provisioning Teams via the MS Graph (owners cannot create Planner plans), owners must be added as members first.

body.Body:
Your invite to collaborate with @{variables('CompanyName')}.
View this email in your browser
@{variables('CompanyName')}

Office 365 Access Invitation

You've been invited as to collaborate with @{variables('CompanyName')}using @{if(equals(triggerBody()?['SpaceType']?['Value'],'Microsoft Teams Team'),'Microsoft Teams','Office 365')} by:

@{triggerBody()?['Author']?['DisplayName']}


You may receive another e-mail from us, you can use either of these to gain access.
Click the button below to accept the invite and gain access to:

@{if(equals(indexOf(triggerBody()?['Title'],' '),-1),toUpper(substring(triggerBody()?['Title'],0,1)),toUpper(replace(concat(substring(triggerBody()?['Title'],0,1),substring(triggerBody()?['Title'],indexOf(triggerBody()?['Title'],' '),2)),' ','')))}

@{triggerBody()?['Title']}
@{triggerBody()?['Description']}
@{if(equals(triggerBody()?['SpaceType']?['Value'],'Microsoft Teams Team'),'Open Microsoft Teams','Get Started')}
Return to the above link at any time for access.
This email has been sent on behalf of the @{variables('CompanyName')} organization. Please act on this email only if you trust the @{variables('CompanyName')} organization. This email may have advertising content. You can unsubscribe from future invitations from the Contoso organization at any time. See Microsoft organization privacy statement to learn more about how Microsoft handles your data.


Facilitated by : Microsoft Corporation, One Microsoft Way, Redmond, WA 98052
body.Subject: @{variables('CompanyName')} Collaboration Invitation

Add_service_account_to_group_-_post_welc.description: Add service account to the group (team) so we can post the welcome message. We will remove the service account after.

body.content:
Welcome to your new Team

Thank you for using Provision Assist.

Your team is now ready for use, you can now start adding Members, Owners, posting channel messages and lots more.

For helpful tips on getting started with Microsoft Teams please visit the help center .

Parse_create_team_JSON.description: Ought to check template operation is also equal to clone and handle if empty.

Check_TeamsTemplateOperation_value.description: Checking create team operation and parsing JSON only required for teams created from templates or cloned teams. Otherwise the JSON output from teamifying the group will be used.

Check_if_member_does_not_already_exist_a.description: Check if member is not added to the team at this stage or this will fail.

Remove_template_team_owners.description: When cloning teams, the owners of the source team will be cloned. We need to remove these owners.

Check_we_are_cloning_a_team.description: Adding Members and Owners is only required if we have cloned an existing team.

Check_if_space_is_a_Team_-_process_owner.description: Execute these actions only if the space type is a Microsoft Teams Team.

body.Body:
Space created

Provision Assist
Space Created - @{triggerBody()?['Title']}

Your @{triggerBody()?['SpaceType']?['Value']} - '@{triggerBody()?['Title']}' has been created and is now ready for use.

Click here to access it.

Enjoy collaborating!
body.Subject: Provision Assist - Space Created

Check_if_external_sharing_is_not_require.description: Disable external sharing on the group if it is not required.

Check_the_policy_covers_all_groups.description: Check the policy applies to All groups. If the policy applies to selected groups only, we will assume this policy should not apply to groups created through Provision Assist.

Check_that_a_lifecycle_policy_exists.description: Check that a group expiration policy exists. We will only store the expiration date if a policy exists.

Check_if_space_is_a_group_or_team.description: We only need to store the expiration date if the space type is a group/team.
